title: Moving static models sometimes doesn't update the visual in gzclient

content.html:
@jacquelinekay found this bug when trying to move static models via the ArrangePlugin. Her particular scenario had lots of models (like the wood_block_stack), so the system was under heavy load. The server would always register the object move, but it wasn't always reflected in the GUI visual location.

I think static models may only send one pose update message, so perhaps the message got dropped?

@iche033 had some insight as well.
